combat1.name: Seize the Moment, Loose the Arrow
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, mighty winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, hitting opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Cunning Scheme: Wealth Redistribution Plan
combat2.descriptionRaw:
Jahoda dashes toward her opponent, entering the Shadow Pursuit state upon contact. While in this state, Jahoda moves continuously and swiftly: If nearby opponents are affected by Pyro, Hydro, Electro, or Cryo, she will quietly attune her Purr-loined Treasure Flask to that element, gradually filling it. When the duration ends or the skill is used again, Jahoda drains the Purr-loined Treasure Flask and deals a single instance of Anemo DMG to nearby opponents. When the Purr-loined Treasure Flask is full, Jahoda immediately drains it, exiting the Shadow Pursuit state and dealing a more powerful instance of Anemo DMG.
If her dash fails to make contact with an opponent, Jahoda instead drops a Smoke Bomb at her location, dealing a single instance of Anemo DMG to nearby opponents.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: When the Purr-loined Treasure Flask becomes full, Jahoda will not immediately discharge it. Instead, for a short duration, she steadily consumes the stored element inside and periodically fires Fluffy Meowballs at nearby opponents, dealing DMG of the corresponding element stored in the Purr-loined Treasure Flask. When a Fluffy Meowball hits an opponent, Jahoda regenerates 2 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 3.5s.

There are many ways to divide wealth in this world — but for Nod-Krai's treasure hunters — and hoarders — only one has ever proven sufficiently effective.

combat3.name: Secret Tool: Hunter's Seven Gadgets
combat3.descriptionRaw:
Time to use the stash that's been sitting at the bottom! Jahoda pulls out two Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators, dealing Anemo DMG to nearby enemies.

Mutual coordination, huh? You put in the Mora for cooperation, and we handle the coordination. Makes perfect sense, right?

passive1.name: Moonsign Benediction: Rooftop Dash
passive1.descriptionRaw: When Jahoda is in the party, the party's Moonsign will increase by 1 level.

passive2.name: Get-Your-Reward Plan
passive2.descriptionRaw:
If your team has at least one Pyro, Hydro, Electro, or Cryo character, the Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators in the Elemental Burst Secret Tool: Hunter's Seven Gadgets will gain enhancements based on the number of characters of each corresponding element.
Jahoda secretly keeps track of these characters. Among them, the element with the highest number of characters determines the effect:
· Pyro: Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators deal 130% of their normal damage.
· Hydro: Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators heal for 120% of their normal amount.
· Electro: The number of Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators increases by one.
· Cryo: The attack interval of Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators is reduced by 10%.

If there's a tie between elements, priority is given in the order: Pyro > Hydro > Electro > Cryo. Only one elemental effect can be triggered at the start.

passive3.name: Berry Sweet Reward
passive3.descriptionRaw: When the Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators from the Elemental Burst Secret Tool: Hunter's Seven Gadgets heal an active team member, if that character's HP is above 70%, their Elemental Mastery is increased by 100 for 6s.

passive4.name: Cunning in the Alleyways
passive4.descriptionRaw:
When dispatched on an expedition in Nod-Krai, time consumed is reduced by 25%.
Additionally, as an employee of the Curatorium of Secrets, Jahoda seemingly has the ability to obtain intelligence from a variety of sources — intelligence that certain factions in Nasha Town might find extremely interesting...
